desc_en: Family opinion score A6 - For a couple to last a long time, it is preferable that both spouses share the same tastes

desc: Score opinions famille A7 - Le mariage est une « sécurité » (matérielle, affective, etc.)
desc_en: Family opinion score A7 - Marriage is “security” (material, emotional, etc.)

desc_en: Family opinion score A8 - Marriage is “for worse and for better”

desc: Score opinions famille A9 - Si vous avez ou si vous aviez des enfants, vous les incitez ou les inciteriez à prendre des risques
desc_en: Family opinion score A9 - If you have or had children, you encourage them or would encourage them to take risks

desc_en: Money opinions score B1 – Proportion of the gain of €100,000 to invest in a risky investment

desc_en: Silver opinion score B2 – Take the widest possible property insurance coverage

desc: Score opinions argent B3 – Prendre la couverture d'assurance sur les personnes la plus large possible
desc_en: Score opinions money B3 – Take the broadest possible insurance coverage for people

desc_en: Silver opinion score B4 – Being a homeowner means having the assurance of always having a roof over your head

desc: Score opinions argent B5 – Préoccupé(e) par le fait de finir éventuellement votre vie dans une maison de retraite
desc_en: Money Opinion Score B5 – Concerned about possibly ending your life in a retirement home

desc_en: Silver opinion score B6 – A system that allows you to stop working at 55 is:

desc: Score opinions santé C1 – Vous pratiquez ou avez pratiqué des sports à risque
desc_en: Health opinion score C1 – You practice or have practiced risky sports

desc: Score opinions santé C2 – Vous avez déjà eu l’impression d’avoir pris des risques inconsidérés dans votre vie professionnelle
desc_en: Health opinion score C2 – You have ever had the impression of having taken unnecessary risks in your professional life

desc: Score opinions santé C3 – Vous avez déjà eu l’impression d’avoir pris des risques inconsidérés dans vos pratiques sportives
desc_en: Health opinion score C3 – You have ever had the impression of having taken unnecessary risks in your sporting activities

desc: Score opinions santé C4 – Vous surveillez votre poids
desc_en: Health opinion score C4 – You monitor your weight

desc: Score opinions santé C5 – Vous surveillez votre alimentation, sans chercher à faire un régime
desc_en: Health opinion score C5 – You monitor your diet, without trying to go on a diet

desc: Score opinions santé C6 – Vous vous faites vacciner même quand la vaccination n’est pas obligatoire
desc_en: Health opinion score C6 – You get vaccinated even when vaccination is not compulsory

desc: Score opinions santé C7 - Vous pensez à faire les rappels de vaccin
desc_en: Health opinion score C7 - You are thinking about getting vaccine boosters

desc: Score opinions santé C8 - Pour gagner quelques années de vie, cela vaut la peine de se priver des plaisirs de l’existence
desc_en: Health opinion score C8 - To gain a few years of life, it is worth depriving yourself of the pleasures of existence

desc_en: Life opinion score D10 - People say that you are rather orderly

desc_en: Life Opinions Score D11 - When you have to take a train or a plane, you arrive well in advance

desc_en: Life Opinion Score D12 – If the weather is uncertain, you take steps to protect yourself

desc_en: Life opinion score D3 – You exceed the authorized speed

desc_en: Life Opinion Score D4 – You are not wearing your seat belt

desc: Score opinions vie D7 – Vous prenez les transports en commun sans ticket
desc_en: Life opinion score D7 – You take public transport without a ticket
